# EnergyFormatter.Unit.calorie

**Case**

The calorie unit. This unit is often used in chemistry. It is abbreviated as “cal.”

## Declaration

```swift
case calorie
```

## Constants

- **EnergyFormatter.Unit.joule**: The joule unit.
- **EnergyFormatter.Unit.kilojoule**: The kilojoule unit.
- **EnergyFormatter.Unit.kilocalorie**: The kilocalorie unit. This unit is used for food calories in some locales. In general, it is abbreviated as “kcal.” However, it may be abbreviated as “C” when used to represent food calories.
